scene.description: Dining room aboard the Cruise Ship, captured through a mirror selfie.
scene.environment: Wood-paneled ship interior with nautical decor — hanging lanterns, wooden beams, round ship windows showing the sea, and a large dining table with plates and mugs scattered around.
scene.mood: Lively, carefree, and adventurous — the atmosphere of a joyful pirate crew at sea.

aesthetic.style: Authentic smartphone mirror selfie on a ship.
aesthetic.look: Bright daylight filtering from portholes; warm maritime tones; realistic texture and depth; filmic natural contrast.

lighting.description: Natural sunlight streaming in from the ship’s windows with a warm bounce off wooden surfaces; subtle fill from mirror reflection for facial clarity; maintain believable shadows and reflections.

demographics.build: Lean and athletic with energetic posture.

appearance.hair: Messy black hair with strands peeking out from under his straw hat.
appearance.skin: Warm tan complexion with natural sheen; minimal retouching to retain lively character.

pose.action: Witty, wide happy grin with one hand holding the phone and the other making a peace sign; leaning slightly toward the mirror with relaxed confidence.
pose.framing: Waist-up 3:4 vertical shot; slightly off-center composition to include ship background.

wardrobe.top: Open red shirt with casual pirate detailing suitable for a captain.
wardrobe.bottom: Classic blue jeans with slightly rolled cuffs.
wardrobe.cloak: Black cloak draped over shoulders, slightly flowing with a worn leather texture.
wardrobe.headgear: Iconic straw hat sitting slightly tilted on his head.

accessories.jewelry: Simple beaded bracelet on one wrist.
accessories.phone: Smartphone with worn leather case, reflecting ship life aesthetic.

props_in_scene.background: Dining table with half-eaten food, tankards, and utensils; crewmates’ shadows or laughter subtly visible in reflection; hanging lanterns and ship ropes visible in soft focus.
props_in_scene.details: Include reflections of ship wood grain and light glints from the sea through the window.

camera_technical.requirements: Correct mirror reversal; maintain natural body proportions; no duplicated phones/hands.
camera_technical.capture: Smartphone wide lens ~24–26mm equiv, f/1.8 look, ISO ~250, 1/125s, WB 4200–4400K.
camera_technical.composition: Subject centered with slight lean; keep fur texture readable; ensure phone and hand pose feel natural.
camera_technical.retouching: Clean minor blemishes only; preserve fabric micro-wrinkles and fur fibers; avoid haloing.
camera_technical.avoid: Warped doors, heavy vignettes, oversharpening, cartoon smoothing, text/watermarks.
